item.title: Flashing with uuu from within a QEMU Hosted Linux VM
item.description: For my current work project I have to integrate flashing a NXP i.MX8 from a virtual machine running Ubuntu Focal Fossa (20.04) on top of a QEMU hypervisor on a Proxmox 6.1 host. The flash process is done with the uuu tool from NXPmicro. Unfortunately the initial flashing attempts were not successful. After quite a few tries a pattern crystallized. The very first flashing attempt after rebooting the VM and resetting the i.
